indicator_name: Annual freshwater withdrawals, total (% of internal resources)
description: Total freshwater withdrawn in a given year, expressed as a percentage of total renewable internal freshwater resources.

indicator_name: Annual freshwater withdrawals, agriculture (% of total freshwater withdrawal)
description: Water withdrawn for irrigation and livestock production.

indicator_name: Annual freshwater withdrawals, industry (% of total freshwater withdrawal)
description: Water withdrawn for direct industrial use.

indicator_name: Annual freshwater withdrawals, domestic (% of total freshwater withdrawal)
description: Water withdrawn for drinking, hygiene and other household uses.
